title: National Queer Theater's Annual Criminal Queerness Festival
description: An annual festival featuring queer theater performances at Here Arts Center in South Village.

title: All Pride, No Prejudice! A Literary LGBTQ+ Celebration
description: A literary celebration at The Center for Fiction in Fort Greene.
address: The Center for Fiction, Fort Greene

title: Ninth Annual Queer|Art|Pride
description: A series of events at various locations celebrating LGBTQ+ art and culture.

title: Museum Mile Festival
description: An annual event where eight museums offer free admission and stay open late, featuring live performances and art activities.

title: Mindy Raf: A (Very) Nervous System
description: Comedian Mindy Raf performs her new stand-up hour at Whiskey Cellar NYC in East Village.

title: Bloom: A Sakura Series Poet Slam
description: A poetry slam competition featuring 10 poets at Hell Phone in Bushwick.
cost: $15 general / 2-for-1 for $25 ($20 general at the door)

title: Booze + Build
description: A playful night of building brick fun for grown-ups at Q.E.D. in Astoria.

title: Naumburg Orchestral Concerts: 2025 Season
description: The Naumburg Orchestral Concerts series returns for its 120th season at Naumburg Bandshell in Central Park, featuring works by various composers.

title: 67th Annual Washington Square Music Festival
description: A series of free alfresco concerts in Washington Square Park featuring various music genres.
